name: Morte Accendere
description:
You are one of the special operations team member sent to investigate three quarantine zones. These locations are swarmed with the infected and strange biological creations. The only way in or out is by air and you can request air drops as necessary. Assist operatives already present in the zone and help survivors by solving quests and missions to gather information about what happened. You can gather resources to craft weapons, supplies and build structures for safe hiding. Use your special abilities to parkour, defend, and attack either hand to hand combat or the weapons at your disposal.

Features:
  • Parkour Mantling, maneuver through the game world anyway you can.
  • Craft items and weapons to assist in your objectives.
  • Non Linear Quests and story, progress through the game as you like.
  • Single Player or CO-OP with Four other players.
  • Build base locations.
  • Transportation, move around in a vehicle, bicycle, or a horse to reach your goals.
